name: Fire Protection Training Simulator
description:
This Fire Protection Training Simulator was designed and developed to provide employers, of any size, with the most cost-effective method of verifying their employees' understanding of fires, how they're started, how to prevent them and how to properly respond in the event of one.

This simulation will enable participants with the opportunity to demonstrate their knowledge of fire classifications by matching certain fires with the appropriate class of fire extinguisher. Verbal coaching is provided in the correct P-A-S-S method of using a fire extinguisher. Participants will also utilize basic fire prevention techniques that can often be implemented to reduce the likelihood of a fire occurring.

Even though an employee's response to a fire will always be based on their employer's policies, procedures, and the employee's level of training... this simulator can be used as a training supplement to fill in gaps in bland or vague fire prevention training programs.
